title: Cant login???
body:
So as i was just chatting away with some mates on the lol client an error pops up. i spam close but it keeps coming up then eventually stops. I restart my client but cant log in. i restart my PC log in then get the error again 
PLEASE HELP.


Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKFdiDYXlZRNs_w8moEsAlQ

replies.body: I'm having the same issue, I'm not entirely sure what is going on... so I'm just waiting it out and doing something else.
yeah i hope its fixed now havent tried yet
